activities: Quattro Hosting LLC provides website, database and sending servers which are used to store contact data, such as email addresses, telephone numbers, names and address details of US and European clients of several email services providers such as GraphicMail and EmailBrain.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For questions or concerns regarding privacy statements and the email and mobile marketing services hosted at Quattro Hosting LLC, the first point of contact is to write to privacy@quattrohosting.com.  For any unresolved complaints or if a complaint is not satisfactorily addressed, Quattro Hosting will utilize the European Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) and the Swiss Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) as its dispute resolution mechanism.
